post.summary: Generate new complete or a partial refund for marketplace
post.description: Generates a new complete or a partial refund.For partial refund of an individual order or for a complete refund with multiple orders at once, the orders must be specified in an array of objects. For a single order, the array will be composed by one single object. For multiple orders, the array will be composed by multiple objects.
Generates a new complete refund when the transaction does not have any orders.

post.summary: Generate a new refund from a deposit transaction

post.description: Generates a new dynamic QR Code.

post.summary: Generate new dynamic QR Code for single or multiple orders
post.description:
Generates a new dynamic QR code for an individual order or for multiple orders at once.
    The orders must be specified in an array of objects. For a single order, the array will be composed by one single object.
    For multiple orders, the array will be composed by multiple objects. Shipping fee: When the orders have shipping fee, you must
    specify it in another order in the array, but for this order, the 'fee' must be 0, the 'company_identifier' should be the requesting
    company's default wallet id and the 'value' should be the shipping fee value.

get.description:
List all transactions data. If no parameter is set, it will automatically select today’s date
     *     as the search parameter.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter by created at start date

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit numbers of itens by page

put.summary: Update a transaction status (ONLY AVAILABLE FOR DEVELOPMENT ENVIRONMENT)
put.description:
This endpoint is only meant for development environment. Update the status of a transaction to
     *     trigger the receipt of webhooks for testing purposes.

get.description:
List all transactions data. If no parameter is set, it will automatically select today’s date
     *     as the search parameter.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter by created at start date

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit numbers of itens by page

get.summary: Search withdrawal transaction by merchant ID
get.description: Returns the found withdrawal transaction data.

post.description: Creates a new withdrawal request using PIX as the payment method.

Creates a new withdrawal request using PIX as the payment method.

PS 1.: Withdrawals that repeat the same payload will always return pending status and with the ID of the first accepted withdrawal. Only the first request will be executed.
Example:
Request 1:
{

    "value": 1,

    "type_key_pix": "cpf",

    "key": "99999999999",

    "description": "Payment to client",

    "client_name": "John",

    "client_email": "client@email.com",

    "client_document": "99999999999",

    "merchant_id": "3debefce-06ae-4eb9-adad-50443a5efd31"

    }


Response 1:
{

    "status": "pending",

    "message": "Saque pendente.",

    "transaction_uuid": "ccc54036-d3b0-598c-a9e1-b7c6c2ff8791"

    }

Request 2:
{

    "value": 1,

    "type_key_pix": "cpf",

    "key": "99999999999",

    "description": "Payment to client",

    "client_name": "John",

    "client_email": "client@email.com",

    "client_document": "99999999999",

    "merchant_id": "3debefce-06ae-4eb9-adad-50443a5efd31"

    }


Response 2:
{

    "status": "pending",

    "message": "Saque pendente.",

    "transaction_uuid": "ccc54036-d3b0-598c-a9e1-b7c6c2ff8791"

    }


PS 2.: Withdrawals that repeat the same CPF, value and PIX key will be considered duplications. Only the first withdrawal request will be made and the others return with a failure status with the transaction_uuid field = NULL.
Example:
Response
{

    "status": "failed",

    "message": "Falha de saque duplicado, mesmo valor, mesma chave PIX e mesmo CPF.",

    "transaction_uuid": "null"

    }


PS 3.: The same merchant ID, regardless of other changes to the payload, will always return the data from the first accepted request.

Request 1:
{

    "value": 1,

    "type_key_pix": "cpf",

    "key": "99999999999",

    "description": "Payment to client",

    "client_name": "John",

    "client_email": "client@email.com",

    "client_document": "99999999999",

    "merchant_id": "3debefce-06ae-4eb9-adad-50443a5efd31"

    }


Response 1:
{

    "status": "pending",

    "message": "Saque pendente.",

    "transaction_uuid": "ccc54036-d3b0-598c-a9e1-b7c6c2ff8791"

    }


Request 2:
{

    "value": 2.35,

    "type_key_pix": "cpf",

    "key": "99999999999",

    "description": "Payment to client",

    "client_name": "John",

    "client_email": "client@email.com",

    "client_document": "99999999999",

    "merchant_id": "3debefce-06ae-4eb9-adad-50443a5efd31"

    }


Response 2:
{

    "status": "pending",

    "message": "Saque pendente.",

    "transaction_uuid": "ccc54036-d3b0-598c-a9e1-b7c6c2ff8791"

    }
